description.raw:
The recent sdformat4 release generated [osrf/simulation pull request 150](https://github.com/osrf/homebrew-simulation/pull/150), but the [bottle build failed](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/os_homebrew/job/generic-release-homebrew_bottle_builder/100/) during the `brew audit` step because of the leftover formula revision.

This PR removes formula revisions when releasing a new version of a package. I decline that previous PR in order to test this branch from start to finish in [pr 151](https://github.com/osrf/homebrew-simulation/pull/151), and the [bottle build was successful](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/os_homebrew/job/generic-release-homebrew_bottle_builder/102/).
description.html:
The recent sdformat4 release generated osrf/simulation pull request 150, but the bottle build failed during the brew audit step because of the leftover formula revision.

This PR removes formula revisions when releasing a new version of a package. I decline that previous PR in order to test this branch from start to finish in pr 151, and the bottle build was successful.

title.raw: Remove formula revision when releasing a new version
